description:
Given an integer, convert it into its binary representation.

#### `Input Format:`
`The input consists of a single integer.`

#### `Output Format:`
`Print the binary representation of the input integer.`

#### `Constraints:`
- `The input integer can be positive or negative.`
- `The absolute value of the input integer should not exceed 10^9.`

#### `Example:`
#### `Input:`
15

#### `Output:`
`1111`

#### `Explanation:`
`The binary representation of 15 is 1111 in base-2 numeral system.`
title: Integer to Binary Conversion
